title: $89+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest
text:
Home > Flight Deals > $89+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest $89+ O/W Caribbean and Mexico Sale from Southwest July 21, 2015 3:35pm by Patricia Magaña , SmarterTravel Staff Tweet 
Southwest has a brand-new sale promoting discounted flights to various Caribbean and Mexican destinations, among them Nassau, Punta Cana, Cancun, and Los Cabos. The sale's short-lived (bookings must be made by 11:59 p.m. on July 23), but travel extends through the entirety of fall (travel on most routes is valid Tuesdays and Wednesdays during August 25 - December 16). Southwest has a brand-new sale promoting discounted flights to various Caribbean and Mexican destinations, among them Nassau, Punta Cana, Cancun, and Los Cabos. The sale's short-lived (bookings must be made by 11:59 p.m. on July 23), but travel extends through the entirety of fall (travel on most routes is valid Tuesdays and Wednesdays during August 25 - December 16). Flights start at $89 one-way (see Houston-Mexico City), though return flights are pricier making round-trip pricing from $210 (as is displayed in our chart below). EDITOR'S OVERVIEW Where to Book: The best prices were found for the travel window of these sales by using a flexible date search, which can be accessed through our flight comparison tool to the right. You can find this promotion on Southwest 's sale page. Pros: Sale routes to sunny places. Cons: Few routes. Verdict: Great sale if the routes and dates apply, especially because Southwest permits two free checked bags. SEARCH FOR THIS DEAL!
